1.desc: The first version of the evershield. Found in the vault. Cannot be deactivated.

2.desc: An upgraded 1st gen shield that improved its strength and could now be deactivated.

3.desc: A early version of massive evershield pylons. These also had the ability to absorb and redirect energy.

3a.desc: These evershield pylons were designed to defend the core. They are massive pylons and only 11 were made.

3b.desc: These were an upgrade on the 3a.

3c.desc: The 3c pylons made further improvements and are the largest of all pylons.

4.desc: An experimental hybrid of the 1st & 2nd gen pylons. Proved to be ineffective.

5.desc: The first experiment of miniturizing the evershield tech. Flaws infromed changes for the 9th gen shield.

6.desc: A prototype of the 7th gen shield. Informed many improvements for the wide-scale production of pylons.

8.desc: A larger pylon version of the 7th gen pylon

9.desc: The smallest type of evershield pylon used on smaller vehicles.

10.desc: These massive pylons bring 8th gen and 3rd gen pylons together to defend planets.
